meanings.definition: A plant of the saxifrage family, typically with large, leathery leaves and pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The bergenia in the garden has beautiful pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a bergenia in my backyard for its lovely blooms.
meanings.sent3: The bergenia decided to wear a pink flower as a hat.
meanings.sent4: The bergenia stood out in the garden like a colorful umbrella.
meanings.sent5: The bergenia's pink flowers were like little bursts of happiness.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the bergenia belongs.
meanings.sent1: The bergenia genus includes various species with unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the bergenia genus to understand its diversity.
meanings.sent3: The bergenia genus held a family reunion for all its plant members.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, the bergenia genus is like a royal family.
meanings.sent5: Each plant in the bergenia genus has its own story to tell.
